title: Ramy Youssef & Patrisse Cullors | Mattis Denounces Trump, Cotton Calls for Deploying Troops Against Protests: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the nationwide protests over George Floyd's murder being incredibly successful in swaying the public opinion and how even military leaders are speaking out against the president's attempts to suppress them.

Then, comedian Ramy Youssef and Black Lives Matter co-founder Patrisse Cullors talk about leading the fight against police brutality and share different ways to help create change.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
